DataElement.preferredName: Aphasia And/Or Apraxia Neurologic Function Scale Domain Clinical Score Assessment Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to aphasia or apraxia neurologic function scale domain.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Aphasia And/Or Apraxia Neurologic Function Scale Domain Clinical Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Impairment of the expression or comprehension of verbal and written language._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._A neurological disorder characterized by the inability to execute skilled movements, despite having the willingness, physical ability and understanding of how to perform them._A specific area of neurological interest within the Raymond neurologic function scale, subdivided into 3 or 4 levels of function with scores based on discrete quantifiable measures._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Impairment of the expression or comprehension of verbal and written language.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
A neurological disorder characterized by the inability to execute skilled movements, despite having the willingness, physical ability and understanding of how to perform them.
A specific area of neurological interest within the Raymond neurologic function scale, subdivided into 3 or 4 levels of function with scores based on discrete quantifiable measures.

Property.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Neurologic Function Scale Assessment Score Value
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A 25-point scale used to evaluate the severity of gross neurologic dysfunction by scoring 15 disabilities across multiple domains._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
